title: Resolve Clinical Data Query
description: A clinical data manager finds a discrepancy in the EDC system and must issue a query to the clinical site for clarification.

tasks.description: Run a validation check in the EDC system that flags an error.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies a patient's reported birth year as 1890, which is inconsistent with their enrollment date.

tasks.description: Draft a data query for the clinical site staff.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent writes a clear, concise query: 'Please verify patient's date of birth. The reported year of 1890 seems unlikely.'

tasks.description: Assign the query to the specific site and responsible user in the EDC system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly routes the query to the site's Clinical Research Coordinator.

tasks.description: Monitor the query status until it is resolved by the site.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent tracks the query until the site responds with a correction (e.g., to 1980) and closes the query.
